title: N. Mark Collins
text:
Nicholas Mark Collins (born 23 April 1952 in <a href="Cheltenham">Cheltenham</a>, <a href="Gloucestershire">Gloucestershire</a>) was the Director of the <a href="Commonwealth%20Foundation">Commonwealth Foundation</a> from 2005 until 2011. He was replaced as interim director by <a href="Dhananjayan%20Sriskandarajah">Dhananjayan Sriskandarajah</a>.
Collins received the <a href="Busk%20Medal">Busk Medal</a> of the <a href="Royal%20Geographical%20Society">Royal Geographical Society</a> (RGS) in 2000.
He is the Chairman of the <a href="Galapagos%20Conservation%20Trust">Galapagos Conservation Trust</a>.
